attributes.action: Add speed cameras from kfc on stanningly road up towards the old fire station
attributes.background: Too many people have been injured on that road due to people speeding and not been able to see any cars coming up due to the lights been on a cress, the lights are faulty and been reported only giving you 4 seconds to cross the road.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  This is a matter for the local council. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
